about.title: Emelmujiro
about.subtitle: AI Education & Solution Development Startup

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description:
Emelmujiro was founded in December 2024 as an AI education and consulting company.
Through practice-focused AI education and custom solution development,
we aim to be a partner that supports and grows with our clients' digital innovation.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Growing as a leading company in AI education and consulting to drive digital transformation

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.subtitle: Footsteps of growth as AI education experts

2022.title: AI Education Begins

2023.title: Education Expansion
2023.description: Conducted AI/ML education projects for major enterprises including Samsung, Hyundai E&C, LG Electronics, and Kakao

2024.title: Specialization & Founding
2024.description: Specialized AI course instructor at Likelion, founded Emelmujiro in December

profile.quote: "Pursuing practice-focused AI education accessible even to non-technical backgrounds"
profile.quoteDescription: My goal is to break down complex AI technology so anyone can understand it, and provide practical education that can be immediately applied to real work. Let's explore the infinite possibilities of AI together.
